title: Senegal v Morocco: Africa Cup of Nations final - live
description: Minute-by-minute report: Will Senegal deny hosts Morocco their first Afcon title since 1976? Join Rob Smyth to find out
content:
Team news
Morocco are unchanged from the semi-final win over Nigeria. Senegal make three changes: Lamine Camara, Antoine Mendy and Mamadou Sarr come in for Krepin Diatta and the suspended pair of Kalidou Koulibaly and Habib Diarra.

title: Syria, SDF agree ceasefire and integration deal
description: President Ahmed al-Sharaa said the deal would allow the Syrian state to reassert control over most areas.
content:
The Syrian government has announced an immediate nationwide ceasefire with the Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF), taking almost full control of the country, according to Syrian state media.
The ceasefire ends nearly two weeks of fighting and... [504 chars]

title: Driver dies after West Lyng parked car crash
description: A driver has died after a vehicle crashed into a parked car on Saturday evening.
content:
A person has died after a vehicle crashed with a parked car, police have said.
Officers said they thought the crash happened at 21:30 GMT on Saturday on the A361 in West Lyng, Somerset, but the vehicle was not discovered until 10:30 on Sunday morning... [343 chars]

title: La Rochelle 17-27 Harlequins: Gutsy Quins knock out former Champions Cup winners
description: Harlequins stun La Rochelle to claim a place and home advantage in the last 16 of the Champions Cup.
content:
Harlequins stunned La Rochelle to claim a home berth in the last 16 of the Investec Champions Cup and knock out the former champions by denying them a losing bonus point.
A Marcus Smith penalty in the final minute saw Quins to a shock win on the road... [778 chars]

title: Scottish Cup draw in full as Celtic and Rangers land home ties and Aberdeen face Motherwell
description: The draw has taken place with just two all-Premiership encounters on the cards in the last 16
